Package com.anji.roshambo Description

com.anji.roshambo contains classes to implement the game of roshambo, also commonly known as rock-scissors-paper. Most of these classes came from the 2003 Computer Roshambo competition. A com.anji.roshambo.AnjiNetRoshamboPlayer object has an artificial neural network controlling such a player. It meets the specifications required of the tournament, although it was never entered.
